description:
Twenge + Twombley is a full service litigation law firm in based in Beaufort, South Carolina. Our attorneys regularly handle cases for clients in Hilton Head, Bluffton and across the south east. While qualified to handle a wide variety of litigation matters, our lawyers have extensive experience handling cases for clients involving serious personal injury, wrongful death, business litigation, workers compensation and probate litigation. Our lawyers are dedicated to obtaining successful outcomes in every case we handle.

Because we don't handle a large volume of clients, our lawyers are able to devote a significant amount of time and resources to each client we represent. Our goal is to obtain the best possible result for our client, even if that means taking the case to trial and appeal.

Whether you have been injured in a car accident, taken advantage of by an insurance company or find yourself a defendant in a pending lawsuit, the attorneys at Twenge + Twombley can work with you to craft a litigation plan that will achieve results. Our attorneys handle cases in both state and federal courts. We have attorneys licensed in South Carolina and Georgia that handle cases across the Southeast.

We offer free consultations to our prospective clients. If you would like to request more information from our firm, contact us at 843-476-4573 to schedule a consultation. We return all messages promptly and are available to meet during weekends by appointment.
